mapper.insert: insert into t_learning_futuredata( id, action, aite, image, important, ninzu, nitizi, old, opinion, place, user_name, nitizi_end, groupshow, interaction, comentary )values( #{id}, #{action}, #{aite}, #{image}, #{important}, #{ninzu}, #{nitizi}, #{old}, #{opinion}, #{place}, #{user_name}, #{nitizi_end}, #{groupshow}, #{interaction}, #{comentary} )
